item.title: Photo by @ronan_donovan // Bree Morrison is a range-rider in the Tom Minor Basin, Montana. Bree spends her days riding through the mountains grouping cattle, checking for signs of predators, and keeping a human presence on the landscape. Bree is joined here by horse Nagos and dog Sage. @natgeo #yellowstone #montana #horse #cowgirl #dog #rainbow
